InstructionData.Title: mines
InstructionData.Author: Anders142536
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Setup alias dsen d0 alias gen d1
alias ratio r0 alias hor r1 alias ver r2
define hashSol HASH("StructureSolarPanelReinforced") define hashBat HASH("StructureBattery") define hashMin HASH("StructureDeepMiner")
loop:
jal manageSolarPanels
lb ratio hashBat Ratio Average bltal ratio 0.1 stopMiners bltal ratio 0.2 startGenerator bgtal ratio 0.8 startMiners bgtal ratio 0.9 stopGenerator
# done sleep 1 j loop
manageSolarPanels: l hor dsen Horizontal l ver dsen Vertical
## these have to be set based on daylight sensor direction add hor hor 90 add ver ver 90
sb hashSol Horizontal hor sb hashSol Vertical ver j ra
startGenerator: s gen On 1 j ra
stopGenerator: s gen On 0 j ra
startMiners: sb hashMin On 1 j ra
stopMiners: sb hashMin On 0 j ra
